title: DevTon Mars Landscape Concept
longDescription:
Preview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a_DEvtcUjHU


This Mars landscape concept features an advanced master material, with 4k textures. There are 6 paintable layers, as well as an auto cliff generation system based on a slope function. This landscape material can be applied to any landscape providing options for tesselation optimization based on distance drawing.

This content also includes 10 unique rock meshes with 4k textures, each having manually configured LOD's. Each rock has a custom created lightmap. Ambient background sounds have been included.

We would like to highly Recommend the use of Distance Field Mesh Generation.


Included Rock Meshes Triangle Statistics:

SM_Mars_Rock_01 / (LOD0 - 10.086) / (LOD1 - 2520) / (LOD2 - 504)

SM_Mars_Rock_02 / (LOD0 - 6.936) / (LOD1 - 1734) / (LOD2 - 346)

SM_Mars_Rock_03 / (LOD0 - 10.092) / (LOD1 - 2522) / (LOD2 - 504)

SM_Mars_Rock_05 / (LOD0 - 10.092) / (LOD1 - 2522) / (LOD2 - 504)

SM_Mars_Rock_06 / (LOD0 - 10.092) / (LOD1 - 1512) / (LOD2 - 504)

**If you have any issues, concerns or general questions please contact us via our official email of devtonstudio@gmail.com**
